name: Coffee Party
description:
What is it?

a short survival-horror game, where you can drink coffee!

More detailed

It looks like coffee party in your office went wrong... You waked up in office, and nobody here, besides a strange man, who is walking here and there. I think is better not to face him. You should call the police and stay before they come. But you feel bad, and you need to drink coffee to not fell asleep. its good that it was coffee party recently, and there are still some cups of coffee here and there.

Is it a horror?

yes

How to play

W,A,S,D - movement

Mouse - look

E - interact

Shift - run

Developer

Game developed by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studios)
